com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.policy

Interface CombiningAlgorithm<T extends Evaluatable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object to be combined
    U - the type of the identifier for T
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombiningAlgorithmBase, DenyOverrides, DenyUnlessPermit, FirstApplicable, LegacyDenyOverridesPolicy, LegacyDenyOverridesRule, LegacyPermitOverridesPolicy, LegacyPermitOverridesRule, OnlyOneApplicable, PermitOverrides, PermitUnlessDeny

    public interface CombiningAlgorithm<T extends Evaluatable>
    CombiningAlgorithm is the interface for objects that implement XACML combining algorithms for rules, policies, and policy sets.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvaluationResult combine(EvaluationContext evaluationContext, java.util.List<CombiningElement<T>> elements, java.util.List<CombinerParameter> combinerParameters)
      Evaluates as many of the CombiningElements supplied with the given CombinerParameters based on the particular combining algorithm and combines their EvaluationResults into a single EvaluationResult.
      Identifier getId()
      Gets the Identifier for this CombiningAlgorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        Identifier getId()
        Gets the Identifier for this CombiningAlgorithm.
        Returns:
        the Identifier for this CombiningAlgorithm

      • combine

        EvaluationResult combine(EvaluationContext evaluationContext,
                       java.util.List<CombiningElement<T>> elements,
                       java.util.List<CombinerParameter> combinerParameters)
                         throws EvaluationException
        Evaluates as many of the CombiningElements supplied with the given CombinerParameters based on the particular combining algorithm and combines their EvaluationResults into a single EvaluationResult.
        Parameters:
        evaluationContext - the EvaluationContext in which to evaluate each of the CombiningElements
        elements - the List of CombiningElements to evaluate
        combinerParameters - the List of CombinerParameters to apply to the combining algorithm
        Returns:
        the combined EvaluationResult
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if there is an error in the evaluate method of any of the CombiningElements
